intro: Hieracium solsonense, commonly known as the Solsonense Hawkweed, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its basal rosette of leaves and produces numerous yellow flowers in a single inflorescence. Native to the mountainous regions of Europe, it thrives in alpine and subalpine environments. The plant has hairy stems and leaves, and its flowers are typically arranged in a single head. It is often found in rocky or gravelly soils and is adapted to cold, high-altitude climates.
